channel.title: Half Life 2 for Console
channel.description:
Has anyone played Half Life 2 for the Xbox? I decided to trade in a couple games to get it. I wanted to see how different HL2 was on the console. Everything appears fine but the background sound like Civil Protection and Dr. Breen's rants seem to echo and sound muffled. Has anyone ever played on this system, is this a normal occurrence for this console version? Are the 360 or Ps3 versions any better? Otherwise, I'll bring it back and get the PC, 360, or Ps3 version.
Any help would be appreciated,
Sean

item.title: Half Life 2 for Console
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
λdam:

I have The Orange Box on both the PC and 360, and I don’t see much difference. The only difference I do know, is the ability to increase the graphics (PC), and the 360 version doesn’t have the Console.

Adam… your avatar is fucking awesome!

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 for Console
item.dc:creator: Garcian_Smith
item.description:
I believe the Orange Box on PS3 suffers from some framerate issues. Also, the console ports aren’t supported by Valve in DLC terms.

item.title: Half Life 2 for Console
item.dc:creator: s1e9a8n5
item.description:
Rossman:

If your going to get HL2 on a console get the Orange Box on Xbox 360. Its a good deal for only 20 bucks even though it’s not on pc.

So PC or 360, got it!

Thanks guys.

item.title: Half Life 2 for Console
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
Lolipopman:

I have only played the 360 version, and I’m pretty sure there’s no PS3 version since coding for it was to hard IIRC. But I can clearly hear Dr. Breen.

https://www.gamespot.com/ps3/action/halflife2episode2/index.html?tag=result;title;2
